title: Doñihue regular
content:
Hi, im new here.  
This is Doñihue regular, a set of dingbatz, based on the chamanto´s ornament.  
Chamanto is a tipical chothe of chilean huaso, udes on rodeo sport.

Please send me your comments.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/do%C3%B1ihue%2001_b_6741.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/do%C3%B1ihue%2001_a_6309.jpg)
author: cotomendoza

comments.content:
Hello Coto

It looks interesting, this project could show more,  
It seems to be a sort of pattern?  
How it works?

Yes, each sign is used in a grid the "telar".  
Is based in a textile work.
Cool! I don't know what I would use it for, but it's cool!
Thanks Dan, is my first dingbatz.
